entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 then light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
